messages.message: <!here> :loudspeaker: PSA: I merged a PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/14060) that enable tracing for instabase stack locally.  Pl DM me if you face any related interruption in flow runs. No action reqd on your end (if you want to see traces for local flow runs, follow steps in PR desc (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/14060)).
Your turnaround times on my requests continue to impress me :smile:
this is great stuff, looking forward to using this! :slightly_smiling_face:
@abhilash thanks to @Heymian for blazing fast :zap: PR reviews :laughing:.

@shaunak @Karthik S don’t know if you’ve looked at this awesome tracing work that @Mohit has done! Once we can establish tracing’s low overhead, I think we can get rid of our custom flow timelines from our dashboard! Wdyt?
cc @Eric Han
@abhilash - This is an excellent work by @Mohit. Integrating timeline / logging with tracing would be a key addition. Definitely vote to get rid of our custom timeline. Jaegar has rich UI as well.
custom timeline has lots of room for improvement
This sounds really awesome, do you’ll have a video demoing where this can be seen/used?

I can create a video, it is live on dogfood, if you:
1. go to dogfood and run a flow
2. go to https://dogfood.instabase.com/jaeger (password in 1pass under “tracing”)
you should be able to see trace corresponding to flow by selecting “celery-app-tasks” under service dropdown.
@Jesika Haria, you can skip 1. as well, as @Youssef just ran a flow on dogfood :slightly_smiling_face:
